title: Kade and the Captives
description: This edition is no longer available. Author plans to release a new edition soon.A drunken bet with his boyfriend leads Noah to the Wolf Den and a night of wild sex he'll never forget. But he gets more than he bargained for, when he ends up in the middle of a war between Lycans and vampires.The pack Alpha orders Kade to seduce the human male drinking in the Wolf Den. Noah is easy on the eyes and Kade agrees, but sparks fly and the Lycan finds himself wondering if he's been seduced as well. When the Alpha reveals his plans for the blue-eyed blond, Kade wonders if he'll be able to carry them out.
author: Gale Stanley
